mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, ID, NAME, NICKNAME, TEL, REPORTED_COUNT, DORMANT, REGIST_DATETIME FROM VIEW_MEMBERLIST ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY N.WRITE_DATETIME DESC) AS CODE , N.TITLE, AI.ID AS ADMIN_CODE, N.WRITE_DATETIME FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN ADMIN_INFO AI ON N.ADMIN_CODE = AI.MEMBER_CODE
